info.name: Google FLoC Disabled
author: geeknik
info.description: The detected website has decided to explicitly exclude itself from Google FLoC tracking.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: dora.incubateur.net
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src https://api.dora.incubateur.net https://api-adresse.data.gouv.fr/ https://plausible.io/api/event https://*.sentry.io http://*.hotjar.com:* https://*.hotjar.com:* http://*.hotjar.io https://*.hotjar.io wss://*.hotjar.com https://client.crisp.chat/static/ wss://client.relay.crisp.chat/ https://storage.crisp.chat/users/upload/; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://metabase.dora.fabrique.social.gouv.fr/app/iframeResizer.js https://plausible.io/js/plausible.js https://static.hotjar.com https://script.hotjar.com http://*.hotjar.com https://*.hotjar.com http://*.hotjar.io https://*.hotjar.io https://client.crisp.chat/; font-src 'self' http://*.hotjar.com https://*.hotjar.com http://*.hotjar.io https://*.hotjar.io https://client.crisp.chat/static/; img-src 'self' data: http://*.hotjar.com https://*.hotjar.com http://*.hotjar.io https://*.hotjar.io https://*.crisp.chat/; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://client.crisp.chat/; frame-src http://metabase.dora.fabrique.social.gouv.fr https://*.hotjar.com http://*.hotjar.io https://*.hotjar.io Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 17 Apr 2022 10:17:49 GMT Etag: "udeism" Permissions-Policy: interest-cohort=() Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Request-Id: a28e76bc-55a1-4ea5-b358-67c3d81c626b X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block DORA : recensement et mise à jour de l’offre d’insertion

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46913
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;dora.incubateur.net.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 46913
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;dora.incubateur.net.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
dora.incubateur.net.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=pzLwiBmOclJJjykziVUJGBTmjDxe9cX4AXPyXnevrig"
dora.incubateur.net.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ?all"

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 42084
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;dora.incubateur.net.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 42084
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;dora.incubateur.net.	IN	 MX
